payload:
## Usage 

 Click on the navigation tree to open the docs

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.format: npm run format:eslint && npm run format:prettier

children.payload:
{"description":"`furo-backdrop`

Displays content with a backdrop.

The element you place in to furo-backdrop will be displayed centered.


```html
  <furo-backdrop @-opened="--BackdropFocus" @-closed="--backdropClosed"
    ƒ-show="--expandIconClicked"
    ƒ-close="--closeRequested, --recordSelected"
    >
     <any-component @-item-selected="--recordSelected" style="width: 90vw; height: 90vh"></any-component>
  </furo-backdrop>

```

You can wire and use the elements in furo-backrop as if they were local elements.

Do not forget to add the furo-backdrop-display somewhere in the parent dom.","summary":"show content with backdrop","path":"src/furo-backdrop.js","properties":[],"methods":[{"name":"_FBPReady","description":"","privacy":"protected","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":33,"column":2},"end":{"line":40,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"show","description":"Initiates the backdrop and shows the content on top of the backdrop area.","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":60,"column":2},"end":{"line":64,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"close","description":"Hides the display.

**Note:** The display will also get closed when the user clicks on the backdrop.","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":71,"column":2},"end":{"line":75,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}}],"staticMethods":[],"demos":[{"url":"demo-furo-backdrop","description":"Basic usage"}],"metadata":{},"sourceRange":{"start":{"line":31,"column":0},"end":{"line":93,"column":1}},"privacy":"public","superclass":"HTMLElement","name":"FuroBackdrop","attributes":[],"events":[{"type":"CustomEvent","name":"closed","description":"closed
The **closed** event will be fired when the displayed content is invisible and the backdrop is closed.

Tipp: Maybe you want to use this event to refocus the initiator.","metadata":{}},{"type":"CustomEvent","name":"opened","description":"opened
The **opened** event will be fired when the content is visible on the backdrop.

Tipp: you can use this to focus something on the shown content.","metadata":{}}],"styling":{"cssVariables":[],"selectors":[]},"slots":[],"tagname":"furo-backdrop","mixins":["FBP"]}

{"description":"`furo-backdrop-display`

This components receives and displays the backdrop requests from furo-backdrop components.

The backdrop display can be placed anywhere in the dom. The higher the better.

Tipp: place it below or inside the component which applies the style vars. Othewise the displayed components
do not know these vars.

```html
 <!-- place the display in your main-stage -->
 <furo-backdrop-display></furo-backdrop-display>
 ```","summary":"Display component for furo-backdrop","path":"src/furo-backdrop-display.js","properties":[{"name":"toDuration","type":"number","description":"Timeout duration, to wait to notify the changes.

Note: the animations in the css are set with 250ms.

If you are interested to use @-opened to load some data, set this value lower. This gives you 250 ms extra time to load content, without feeling slow.

If you are interested to use @-opened to show some ui stuff, set this value higher or equal 250.","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":31,"column":4},"end":{"line":31,"column":19}},"metadata":{"polymer":{}},"defaultValue":"100"},{"name":"start","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"Needed to start the animation.","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":44,"column":6},"end":{"line":44,"column":45}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Boolean"}}},{"name":"show","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"Indicates that the backdrop is shown.","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":49,"column":6},"end":{"line":49,"column":44}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Boolean"}}}],"methods":[{"name":"_FBPReady","description":"flow is ready lifecycle method","privacy":"protected","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":69,"column":2},"end":{"line":117,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"close","description":"closes the backdrop.
You can close the backdrop on the display element, this is useful when you want to close the backdrops on page
changes.

Usualy the component which triggers the backdrop or is displayed closes it.","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":126,"column":2},"end":{"line":138,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"render","description":"","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":220,"column":2},"end":{"line":226,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"TemplateResult"}}],"staticMethods":[],"demos":[{"url":"demo-furo-backdrop","description":"Basic usage"}],"metadata":{},"sourceRange":{"start":{"line":24,"column":0},"end":{"line":227,"column":1}},"privacy":"public","superclass":"HTMLElement","name":"FuroBackdropDisplay","attributes":[{"name":"to-duration","description":"Timeout duration, to wait to notify the changes.

Note: the animations in the css are set with 250ms.

If you are interested to use @-opened to load some data, set this value lower. This gives you 250 ms extra time to load content, without feeling slow.

If you are interested to use @-opened to show some ui stuff, set this value higher or equal 250.","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":31,"column":4},"end":{"line":31,"column":19}},"metadata":{},"type":"number"}],"events":[],"styling":{"cssVariables":[],"selectors":[]},"slots":[],"tagname":"furo-backdrop-display","mixins":["FBP"]}

{"description":"`furo-panel`
Simple content panel with predefined margins.

### Styling
The following custom properties are available for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default  | Fallback
----------------|-------------|----------|----------
`--furo-panel-margin` | Margin size | 0 var(--spacing-s) 0 var(--spacing-s) | --","summary":"content panel with predefined {"description":"`furo-ripple` gives the ripple effect to a element > Note: Add a `position:relative` to the parent element. use it directly in an element: ## trigger the ripple effect via wire ## style vars with variable `--furo-ripple-bg-color` you can modify the backgroud color of the ripple effect","summary":"add a ripple effect","path":"src/furo-ripple.js","properties":[{"name":"noink","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"Disables the click, only ripples with `trigger()`","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":115,"column":6},"end":{"line":115,"column":45}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Boolean"}}}],"methods":[{"name":"connectedCallback","description":"","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":47,"column":2},"end":{"line":53,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"trigger","description":"animate the ripple effect","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":122,"column":2},"end":{"line":127,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}}],"staticMethods":[],"demos":[],"metadata":{},"sourceRange":{"start":{"line":41,"column":0},"end":{"line":128,"column":1}},"privacy":"public","superclass":"LitElement","name":"FuroRipple","attributes":[{"name":"noink","description":"Disables the click, only ripples with `trigger()`","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":115,"column":6},"end":{"line":115,"column":45}},"metadata":{},"type":"boolean | null | undefined"}],"events":[],"styling":{"cssVariables":[],"selectors":[]},"slots":[],"tagname":"furo-ripple"}

{"description":"`furo-split-view` is a layouter for master detail views. You can add the attribute scroll on the detail view to make the content scrollable. ```html
Master
